Posts.Content: Nov 18, 2012 09:52PM annemarieh wrote: Hi NYCme! I used Dr Heerdt at Sloan. Actually, she operated on me and my cousin! Excellent Dr, and she has a very good bedside manner. That was almost 3 yrs ago. This Oct. I decided to have a double mastectomy. So, I ventured across the street to Weill Cornell. There I saw gen surg. Alexander Swistel, and PS Otterburn. PS Talmor is very good also. All 3 came very highly recommended. So far no complaints! Good luck!
Posts.Title: NYC Breast Surgeon Recommendation Please NYCMs Zer35
